title: FS: N28 Buffalo Bill Cody and two N172 Patsy Tebeau
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: N28 Buffalo Bill Cody and two N172 Patsy Tebeau
posts.post_content:
Haven't bumped this in a year.  Radbourn and Clarkson no longer available.....

Buffalo Bill Cody - $500  SGC 70
Patsy Tebeau (your choice) -$275 each SGC 20 or 30

Any reasonable offers will be considered.  PM me or email me at [url]eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] if interested or to request larger scans - my scanner seemed to focus on the plastic SGC cases instead of the cards.  Thanks for looking.

Eric Angyal

For price drop.  Thanks for looking.

Eric
